Reviews.Title: very upset

Reviews.Content: Could not get it activated. Should have notified that you may ave problems activating it. o well I guess I'm SOL :-[

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: kourtney franklin
Reviews.Content: while it wasnt the product that i was looking for, it worked out just fine for a friend of mine

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Techno Mamma 2
Reviews.Content: Hope I can use it on another phone that I am going to purchase for my son in South Carolina
